attributes.action: Allow all HGV Drivers to retire at 60 with access to full pay pension
attributes.additional_details: To provide comprehensive support and maintain high standards for our valued HGV drivers, recognizing their crucial role in maintaining the nation's supply chain.  As essential transport professionals, our lorry drivers are key to keeping the country functioning.
attributes.background: To allow hgv drivers to retire at the age of 60 with access to full pay pension due to the nature of hours worked and constant concentration they require for every day that was worked many hours a driver has to spend behind a wheel.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about when people retire and when they can access their pension are a matter for employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
